title: Black-Owned Businesses Hoping Summer Boom Continues
itunes:title: Black-Owned Businesses Hoping Summer Boom Continues
description:
Dr. Ian Lustbader, Clinical Professor of Medicine at NYU, provides a coronavirus and vaccine update. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Retail Reporter Jordyn Holman talk about black-owned businesses hoping the summer boom doesn’t fade. Iona College Professor and Bloomberg News Political Contributor Jeanne Zaino provides a recap of the final general election presidential debate of 2020 and gives a look ahead. And we Drive to the Close with Bob Doll, Chief Equity Strategist at Nuveen.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Paul Sweeney. Producer: Doni Holloway. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
